user_instruction: 'Send Dr. Smith the latest findings on our remote learning study. You can check out my Gmail and NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Latest Findings from Our Remote Learning Study

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. When you have a moment, could you please send me the most recent findings and any supporting materials from our remote-learning study? If it’s helpful, you can pull the information from your Gmail threads or the NotionManager workspace where we’ve been logging updates.

A concise summary along with any key data tables, figures, or slide decks would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you very much for your help!

Best regards,  
Elizabeth

final_output:

A concise summary along with any key data tables, figures, or slide decks would be greatly appreciated.
